text:
As we start using this tool regularly from today, please follow these instructions:

  • Clear browser cache or use a new browser / Incognito mode before logging in.
  • Remember your password and keep it noted safely. Frequent password resets may cause performance issues.
  • Refresh your tracker data every day before starting work.
If any inconsistency arises, please contact Muid Bhai. [We've worked hard to provide you with the best solution. That's why we have implemented client-side state management, so you can work smoothly without refreshing multiple times a day. Please follow the above process to ensure the best experience.] Regards, Pathao AI
